messages.text: in dbd's current state, survivors have the advantage on a lot of maps due to boon totems, horrible map balance, and dead hard validation. Also, In my opinion, this is probably one of the worst places DBD has ever been in. Killer is even more of a chore to play, and incredibly stressful! MMR doesn't help either, because it's actually incorrect in its grading, every game is sweatfest or sleepfeast. Real shame that you need to play meta killers or be a comp player to win consistently at high MMR.
People play killer and act like there very life is on the line why? Itâ€™s boring to watch and play. Game will be dead soon

You're probably here because I stomped you out six ways from Sunday and you have no idea who to blame. Survivors make a mockery of killer mains and everything we deal with. In such circumstances, I stand resolute to my cause. I will not be apologizing for doing what I can to win.
